channel.title: How do you change your port?
channel.description:
How do you change you port :confused:
Thank you The Rs Rulez

item.title: How do you change your port?
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

ok, here

	public static int serverlistenerPort = 43594; //43594=default

oh and if you have a pk server its probably like this

public static int serverlistenerPort = 5555;

just make the 43594 or 5555 whatever number you want yor port to run on.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you change your port?

item.title: How do you change your port?
item.dc:creator: @The_Rs_Rulez The Rs Rulez
item.description:
@The_Rs_Rulez wrote:

[quote=“Hiaburi, post:2, topic:69536”]Your port is in the server.java file if you wanna change the port it runs on, if you wanan change the port in moparscape, to sign onto say a pk server it is in file[br][size=1]Posted on: March 21, 2007, 02:50:47 AM[/size][hr]if its the server port your looking for search for 43594 or 5555 in ur server.java file.[/quote] you can copy some text where i can looking for??

Read full topic
